EnExplanation: The word 'oli' is the past tense form of the verb 'olema' which means 'to be' in Estonian.

Samples.EeSentence: See oli ilus päev, kui kõik olid rõõmsad ja naeravad.
Samples.EnSentence: It was a beautiful day when everyone was happy and laughing.

Samples.EeSentence: Eile oli ilus ilm ja ma käisin pargis.
Samples.EnSentence: Yesterday was a beautiful day and I went to the park.
